alert.note: Alert for Inland Pender (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 5:24PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Pender County through 600 PM EDT... At 524 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Penderlea, or 9 miles southwest of Wallace, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Penderlea, Murray Town, Maple Hill, Willard, and Watha. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 388 and 397. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
